explains: v. 干涉，干扰；阻碍，妨害；（未经允许）摆弄，（尤指）弄坏；（光或其他电磁波）相互作用，相互干扰；（指马）碰踝，绊脚
wordGroup: interfere with 干扰，干涉；妨碍；触动或弄坏；乱动；与……抵触
interfere in vt. 干涉，干预

sentences.en: We take the view that it would be wrong to interfere.
sentences.cn: 我们所持的态度是：干涉是错误的。

sentences.en: I try not to let work interfere with my personal life.
sentences.cn: 我尽量不让工作干扰我的私生活。

sentences.en: She never allows her personal feelings to interfere with her work.
sentences.cn: 她从不让她的个人感情妨碍工作。
